game_name: The Rhythm of the Knight - Demo
game_description: The Rhythm of the Knight is a rhythm game based on your reflexes and your lightsaber mastery. Deflect the shots Cut the objects thrown at you Destroy or avoid the obstacles But don't lose the beat.
review_1: If there is an actual non demo I’m buying it
review_2: What if you had a light saber in pistol whip? That’s what this is. But….it’s broken. It’s a great idea for a clone but currently it’s broken. Once you figure out you don’t have to do anything because nothing will hurt you, you kinda give up. Update: Devs said they are working on it…so that’s a good thing…going to keep eye on this one.
review_3: very promising hope you all stick with it and move forward with this i woul love to see the finished product the one song demo was unique and fun and could be a workout game
review_4: Really cool demo! Looking forward to playing the final version of the game.
